text: Phillip Duane Hardberger (born July 27, 1934) is an American politician, lawyer, and jurist. He was Mayor of San Antonio, Texas from 2005 through 2009. He is a Democrat, but he was elected on a non-partisan ballot. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of San Antonio Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Phil Hardberger
